item.description:
I had the good fortune to see the World Premier Band the other night, and they sure put on a great show. They feature synchronized dance moves and funk-a-fied covers of popular songs. They have a tight sound and really know how to get the crowd movin' and grovin'!

They are going back to the Charlie Horse in June for what is sure to be another fun night, so I thought I would share the opportunity with the group.

Please note that this will be a joint event with Variety of Fun, so if you happen to belong to both groups, please only RSVP YES to one of the groups.
item.name: World Premier Band
